hero.heading: Don’t miss out on a revolution!
hero.subheading: Shop sustainable, fair and eco brands for less.
hero.subheading2_html:
New sales promotions every week.
Time limited availability.
Join our club and save up to 30%!

item1.text: We are a members only shopping club, where you can discover and shop sustainably produced fashion and lifestyle items for better prices.
item1.title: Sign up for free and save money

item2.text: We frequently launch new discounted collections with a time limited pre-order phase, based on your feedback. Join the pre-order phase to claim your personal items exclusively for the best price.
item2.title: New tailored offers every week

item3.text: Your needs are our rules. We listen carefully to what you have to say and what you want to do in our club. For instance, you, as part of our community, decide what products and brands you can shop here.
item3.title: You are the center of our good business

item1.text: We are the new channel for positive impact brands that removes the margin loss classic retailers provoke. We collect bulk orders after a … days sales period and focus on on-demand quality to unlock better prices and margins for everyone involved.
item1.title: Pre-orders and no returns

item2.text: We carefully select and curate our offers and brands with the focus on their positive impact values to shape a new form of shopping and consumption. We enable new sustainable production chains that wouldn’t be actionable without our pre-order model.
item2.title: We work with brands that are committed to sustainability.

item3.text: We pledge ourselves to create business that is positive for everyone, including our planet.
item3.title: Changing how we consume for the better, forever.

homepage.last_part: Join our community and become part of a revolution

about_us.heading: Changing how we consume for the better, forever.
about_us.subheading: We pledge ourselves to creating business that is positive for everyone - including our planet.
about_us.heading_2: That’s why we believe in our strong vision.
about_us.subheading_2: Where we team-up together and overcome the shortcomings of a political and ‚old world economy‘ that is ignoring social injustices and the environmental crisis.

hero.heading: We are on a mission
hero.subheading: Because the united buying power of all of us consumers, will change how businesses have to act - it’s up to us.

middle.heading: Shaping a new way to shop
middle.subheading: As member of our shopping community or part of our startup team in Lisbon, you can be the change you want to see in the world.

our_values.heading: Our Values
our_values.subheading: We believe in a world in which everyone feels empowered to drive positive change.

item1.text: No green washing. We believe that being transparent about how products are produced and businesses are run is the key for trustworthy collaborations and customer relationships.
item1.title: Transparency

item2.text: We believe authentic and relevant content created with passion and trust is the best way to get across the messages and stories of sustainable businesses.
item2.title: Authenticity

item3.text: We believe that making sustainable businesses the leading businesses of tomorrow is only achievable through the combined power of individuals supporting it together.
item3.title: Progress through teamwork

item4.text: We believe in open conversations, exchange of knowledge and the discussion of topics between reflective individuals and other parties without excluding anyone.
item4.title: Inclusiveness

item5.text: We believe in a positive mindset and learning from each other to discuss how we can progress together every day, step by step. There are no barriers, anyone can participate no matter of the individual level of knowledge and sustainability.
item5.title: Positivity

meet_the_band.heading: Meet the band behind the music
meet_the_band.subheading: Our founders and leading talents come from some of the biggest names in the retail and startup industry such as Outfittery, Uniplaces and GoPopUp. We are dedicated to our mission, vision and values and work together to change the way how we consume for the better, forever.

buttons.i_want_to_become_a_member: I want to become a member
buttons.i_want_to_join_the_team: I want to join the team

timer.heading: We open our sustainable lifestyle shopping club doors soon
timer.subheading_html: Be the first the discover and shop sustainable fashion brands with up to 30% discounts. Join the worlds first impact shopping club and get offers tailored just for you while helping to create a better future together.

footer_subscription.heading: Join our community and become part of a revolution
footer_subscription.subheading: Stay tuned and be the first to join by signing up to our newsletter!

form.clicking_agreement_html: By clicking this button you subscribe to our newsletter and agree to our Terms and Conditions
